creator: andre.wendel@bmw.de
text:
Hello,

currently I'm searching for an ability to disable, enable, remove and add balancer members via an API call via webservice (REST/SOAP).

The reason for this would be to integrate this into nagios, so that I'm able to disable members or reactivate members automatically via an external monitoring tool.

The UI of the balanacer member is really hard to parse and not the best way to provide such services in an stable way?

Best regards,
André
